title: Gorgeous renovated victorian with Chefs kitchen, large deck
description:
Three bedroom, 2 1/2 bathroom Victorian House a block from the trolley available 9 months starting September 1, 2022, though there is some flexibility with the dates.
This house is over 2000 square feet of living space. There is a large front porch and garden. You walk through double doors to huge family room with a orange fireplace mantel, crown molding, and inlaid wood floors. Large ornate stair case brings you up to the second floor with the bedrooms. Then you enter the dining room on a bay through french doors. First floor has a large chef's kitchen with six burner stove, granite counter tops, large kitchen island, and stainless steel appliances. There is a laundry room and half bath too. The first floor has an open floor plan, retaining many of the historic characteristics with an updated modern kitchen. The best of both worlds.
The back yard has a huge roof deck and a tree lined side garden. The side of the house also has a large garden.
This house is perfect for grad students, professors, and families. We are really strict with who we rent to because its our family house.
Large room with non-working fireplace, hardwood floors, ceiling fan, 4 windows, and desk.
Medium room with ceiling fan, hardwood floors, closet with French doors, and three windows on a bay.
Large room, 2C, with 4 windows, hardwood floors, ceiling fan, large closet, and private bathroom with tub.
Hard wood floors throughout house. Brand new bathrooms. Jacuzzi bathtub in bathroom, rain shower, stone tiles, and granite counter tops.
There is a mother in law apartment above so tenants will have the tenant walking through to her apartment.
WiFi through out the house. House is furnished.
Huge roof deck.
There is a house cat, Shaka Zulu that comes with the house.
Rental is from September 1, 2022 to May 30, 2023. Move in can be a bit flexible also.
Give me a call to set up an appointment.
Mike

title: Tons of Natural Light, Balcony, New Kitchen, Hardwood floors
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

description:
3636 Haverford Ave – 3 Bed 3 Bath Apartment Available starting September 1

We are located 1 block from the Dragon Route pick up location at 36th and Spring Garden Streets. Even if you don’t have a car it’s super easy to get around. This is the best housing you can find in the area boasting LARGE bedrooms, modern kitchens with stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, alarm systems, laundry, dishwashers, and more.
This apartment has a great layout with tall ceilings, tons of natural light, hardwood floors, all wood kitchen cabinets, and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, microwave, stove, and full size refrigerator. This apartment boasts powerful central air to keep you cool in the summer and central heat to keep you warm in the winter. Washer and Dryer in your apartment as well as a spacious living room with double pained windows, intercom system, and alarm system. All bedrooms boast good closet space perfect for any large wardrobe and new windows letting great natural light pour in all day long.

title: Convenience at your finger tips! Sweet Fitler Sq 3 bed 2 bath home!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available Now!
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: This Old House
description:
Excellent location, 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath three story located on one of the nicest blocks in Southwest Center City. Recently restored facade leads to open living room/dining room area with original living room mantle and built-in China cabinet in dining room and low maintenance laminate plank flooring throughout. Updated kitchen opens to spacious original brick courtyard in rear.
New berber carpeting on second and third levels. Updated full bath on second floor with large bedroom and oversized walk-in closet.
On the third floor is another large bedroom and a smaller third bedroom great for child, den, or office. There is a large hallway closet and newer half bath on this floor as well.
The house also features central air and finished basement, and laundry facilities.
Walking distance to University City, CHOP, and all Center City has to offer.
Pet OK with Landlord approval and additional deposit.
Rent does not include gas and electricity, includes cold water/sewer.

title: Pet Friendly House with Yard close to UofPenn, New Kitchen
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.
